Mechatronics Engineer

Hello, I'm Carlos Ramírez

Mechatronics Engineer | Robotics & AI Specialist

I'm a mechatronics engineer specializing in robotics, computer vision, and artificial intelligence. My work focuses on creating advanced autonomous systems and implementing cutting-edge AI solutions for complex robotics challenges.

Featured Projects

Some of my best work in robotics and AI systems

View All Projects

Autonomous Delivery Robot

A fully autonomous robot designed to navigate indoor environments and deliver items to specific locations.

ROS2 Computer Vision SLAM C++

AI-Powered Robotic Arm

A robotic arm that uses deep learning to identify and pick up objects of various shapes and sizes.

PyTorch ROS Python Computer Vision

Drone Navigation System

A vision-based navigation system for drones that enables autonomous flight in GPS-denied environments.

OpenCV Machine Learning C++ Python

Honors received for my work and contributions

View All Awards

Outstanding Innovation in Robotics

International Robotics Association

September 2023

Awarded for developing a novel approach to robot learning from demonstration that significantly reduces training time while improving task performance.

IEEE International Conference on Robotics and Automation (ICRA)

May 2023
